snippet: Investigators released preliminary results from a clinical trial of T-DM1, a drug that targets and kills a type of cell that appears in some breast cancers.
lead_paragraph: Investigators released preliminary results from a clinical trial of T-DM1, a drug that targets and kills a type of cell that appears in some breast cancers.

headline.seo: Ferrying a Drug Into a Cancer Cell
headline.main: Ferrying a Drug Into a Cancer Cell
